abstract: Joseph C. Dilg, a longtime deal maker for the energy sector, was the managing partner of the law firm Vinson & Elkins from 2002 until 2011.
snippet: Joseph C. Dilg, a longtime deal maker for the energy sector, was the managing partner of the law firm Vinson & Elkins from 2002 until 2011.
lead_paragraph: The investment banking firm Greenhill & Company said on Tuesday that it had hired Joseph C. Dilg, a veteran deal maker in the energy industry, as a vice chairman in its Houston office.

headline.main: Greenhill Hires Energy Lawyer as Vice Chairman

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
